definition: A type of educational institution typically attended by children between the ages of six and ten, serving as their initial formal schooling experience.

examples.german: Mein Bruder geht in die Grundschule.
examples.english: My brother goes to primary school.
Primary school lasts for four years.

examples.german: In der Grundschule lernen die Kinder lesen und schreiben.
examples.english: In primary school, children learn to read and write.

examples.german: Die Grundschule ist die erste Stufe des Bildungssystems.
examples.english: Primary school is the first stage of the education system.
